sentences.sContent: Yet the big brewers have been parsimonious in their marketing budgets, typically investing just 10% or so of their revenues, compared with around 15% at companies like Unilever and Procter &Gamble.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet the big brewers have been parsimonious in their marketing budgets, typically investing just 10% or so of their revenues, compared with around 15% at companies like Unilever and Procter &Gamble.
sentences.sCn: 而啤酒厂商在销售预算上却很吝啬，仅投入收入的10％。 与之相比，联合利华和宝洁公司的投入则在15％左右。

synos.tran: 吝啬的；过于节俭的；质量差的
